summary: This is about the life and myths about famous opera singer Maria Malibran (1808-1836). She died on the stage.
cast: Magdalena Montezuma|Christine Kaufmann|Candy Darling|Manuela Riva|Ingrid Caven|Anette Tirier|Einar Hanfstaengl|Gabor von Lessner|Kurt Jungmann|Joachim Bauer
title: Der Tod der Maria Malibran
